pages.text: A specially prepared crafting area consists of a Grove Stone and a Fey Crafter. The Grove Stone itself must be activated using a sufficient $(info) $(l:spells/spell_grove_supplication)Supplication$() spell, and when activated it will draw in fey particles to itself.

Once activated, a $(info) Grove Stone can power any number of Fey Crafters within its radius. The crafter itself requires five ingredients to produce the desired result, and must be activated with a ritual $(l:apparatus/knives)Knife.$()
